content: I've been using it as a way to verify prior enlistment. Is it reliable enough to do that? Everyone i've checked that i know was in the military is in the DOD record list of the buddy finder. with 1 exception. And he's the one i dont' think was really prior service.
reply: I've been using it as a way to verify prior enlistment. Is it reliable enough to do that? Everyone i've checked that i know was in the military is in the DOD record list of the buddy finder. with 1 exception. And he's the one i dont' think was really prior service.
title: How reliable is the Military.com Buddy finder

content: Not as reliable as one is led to accept. There are many of us who enlisted 40 years ago that do not show up, other than on a "Military.com Member"...no DOD record. In essence, if you enlisted prior to 1970, chances are NOT in your favor that you'll have any luck in finding anyone, unless they are a "Military.com Member". With these new aborted changes made of late...your chances have diminished that much more.
